name: SpeechRecognition.start
description: The start() method of the Web Speech API starts the speech recognition service listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The start() method of the Web Speech API starts the speech recognition service listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition.
